Reviews.Title: “Comfortable Hotel with a Fantastic View”
Reviews.Author: videoordvd
Reviews.Content: recently visited istanbul week stayed cihangir hotel hotels location wonderful view bosphorus absolutely worth paying bit extra looking window seeing bosphorus bridge definitely highlight trip walk taksim square mass transit airport shuttles located short yes leg walk involve walking fairly steep hill didnt navigating actually bumpy streets taksim luggage lit didnt dangerous late night children playing times hotel staff courteous helpful bit dour spoke english able answer questions reasonably glad double single hotel repairs bit outside wall bathtub ready fall seat chair broken rest linens bit dingy set lose cleanliness department didnt actual garbage cleaned daily overall hotel value paid recommend contacting hotel directly web site rates cheaper online booking sites bit repair didnt interfere stay inexpensive hotel wonderful view centrally located exploring istanbul cihangir hotel choice

Reviews.Content: location hotel walking distance taksim square cihangir street nice view breathtaking breakfast included turkish breakfast likethe expect space pricethe confused cleanliness definitely hotel thorough cleaning am crazy cleanliness pay attention details dust near wall bases conditioner filters dusty chairs balcony copper shower mixer upset
